name: MG Astor
description: The price of MG Astor, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 9.98  - 17.90 Lakh. It is available in 13 variants, with engine options ranging from 1349 to 1498 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Astor comes with 6 airbags. MG Astor is available in 7 colours.
